Text:
Before Alexia knows it, they are in a white
laboratory.
The demon's arm...!
Ruins! They're huge!

Im-Impossible! You wretch! Must you divulge even
this?!

Stop, avert your eyes! Miserable spawn of the test
subjects do not deserve to know such things!

The shiny red liquid is said to be akin to Diablos'
own blood.

One drop would impart vast power and an eternally
youthful body.
You mean...immortality?
That's what the Cult is really after...
Now don't you think that Father Nelson...
and the man over there look very much alike?
...No way!
Alexia looks at Nelson's face in a panic.

Just as Alpha suggested, he and the man in white
look very similar. Or once did.

It goes so far past the point of resemblance that one
can only think they are the same person.

We figured since you were there, you would likely be
a wonderful source of information.
What is the name of this drug?
Ulp...
Tears! Tears of Diablos!
But this drug has two drawbacks.
Drawbacks...?
I figured out that much just by looking at him.
He used to have hair in the past!
But now...
No!

That's not true!!! My hair fell out due to stress!
Everyone becomes so much more of a bother
when they don't die!

Those fools! All they ever do is quarrel, but, oh,
when it comes time to press me to set things right
do they sure figure out how to get along quickly!
Um...sorry I said anything.

One of the drawbacks of the Tears of Diablos is that
they must be taken regularly or the effects will be
lost.
Correct.

The second is that they can only be produced in very
small quantities. How many per year?
Twelve.

Oddly enough, there are also 12 members in the
Knights of Rounds, the Cult's upper echelon. What
a coincidence
(Knights of Rounds!)
You still have yet to perfect the Tears.

The keys to doing so are the sealed fiend and the
scions of descendants of the heroes. Say, one such
as myself, that has inherited much of my ancestor's
blood
As the 11th member, isn't that correct?
...Heheh...Heheheh...
Hahaha.
So, at last... you have recognized me.
I am Nelson the Avarice!
//ムービー再生
And it's like I always say...
Make sure to check that your prey is truly dead.
Be ready.
Heheheh...Hyahahaha!
*shocked gasp*

The is no trace of the clergyman in his visage.
No, this is the face of a ferocious warrior.
The scene changes.
